aiofauna.asgi moduleÔÉÅ

class aiofauna.asgi.ASGIServer(*args, title: str = 'AioFauna', servers: list[str] | None = None, description: str = 'AioFauna API', version: str = '0.0.1', openapi_url: str = '/openapi.json', **kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: APIServer

An ASGI-compatible API.

Currently only supports HTTP and is compatible with ASGI 2.0.

Tested with: uvicorn mangum

async asgi(scope: MutableMapping[str, Any], _, send: Callable[[MutableMapping[str, Any]], Awaitable[None]]) → None[source]ÔÉÅ
